name: Aki (Merttoygar)
description:
How to Play

You must use the “WASD“ keys to walk.

You need to press the “Space” key to make the character jump. 

You have to press “F“  to hit the enemies by ElectricBall.

You need to press the “E” key to heal the character. 

Game Story

Our character, Aki, was brought up in the Senso-Ji temple when she was little. But as soon as she got the chance, she managed to escape. Before Aki could reach his family, her family was killed by the chief Ninjas in the temple. The old samurai master in the village is the best friend of his family and gets an education from her because she has nowhere to go. But she has a trait that no one else has. This feature is that she can throw a lightning ball as well as a fight. After a certain development, she returns to the temple to take his revenge. She takes the Ninjas in the temple under her protection, and thanks to special coins from the ninjas, she also receives the treasure of Miyamoto, the best samurai ever.

Game Concept

The concept of the game is a 3D action game. The main goal in the game is to kill the ninjas who protect the temple one by one and then gain access to the treasure of Miyamoto, the oldest Warrior, by throwing loot coins from them into the Bonzai tree.

Visual of Game

The game has 2 levels. 

1.Patronizing temple. 

2.Miyamoto's treasure. 

Download and play the game so that you can experience these described in the game.
